body_html: @kmader: I like this, but right now we don't have a good way to test ipython notebooks, which means it's very hard to keep updated if we make changes. The udacity notebooks already often break, and I'm worried about adding more notebooks at this point, but I could be convinced otherwise. @martinwicke

The udacity notebooks already often break, and I'm worried about adding more notebooks at this point, but I could be convinced otherwise.  @martinwicke
body: @kmader: I like this, but right now we don't have a good way to test ipython notebooks, which means it's very hard to keep updated if we make changes.  The udacity notebooks already often break, and I'm worried about adding more notebooks at this point, but I could be convinced otherwise.  @martinwicke
